Jof Davies has over 20 years of experience with Adobe Premiere Pro. His editing workflow includes:

- Structured timeline organisation using markers, sub-sequences, and nested compositions.
- Efficient proxy/offline editing using globally consistent proxy formats.
- Colour adjustment and exposure correction for factory and studio environments.
- Audio enhancement using EQ, noise reduction, level matching, and compression.
- Multicamera sync and switching for podcast and Tech Corner projects.
- Rapid editing workflows enabling high output volume during peak periods.
